ImageBitmapRenderingContext.summary: The ImageBitmapRenderingContext interface is a canvas rendering context that provides the functionality to replace the canvas's contents with the given . Its context id (the first argument to or ) is "bitmaprenderer".

remarks.para: This interface is available in both the window and the worker context.

ImageBitmapRenderingContextCanvas.summary:
The ImageBitmapRenderingContext.canvas property, part of the
Canvas API, is a read-only reference to the
or object that is associated with the given context.

ImageBitmapRenderingContextTransferFromI.summary:
The ImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap()
method displays the given in the canvas associated with this
rendering context. The ownership of the ImageBitmap is transferred to the
canvas as well.

remarks.para:
This method was previously named transferImageBitmap(), but was renamed in
a spec change. The old name is being kept as an alias to avoid code breakage.
